content: are you ready to embark on a crochet journey that combines the classic elegance of traditional designs with a modern twist look no further than the cosy ripples crochet blanket pattern this stunning pattern available in eight different sizes from preemie to king will have you hooked from the very first stitch what sets this pattern apart is its versatility while it looks absolutely breathtaking when worked up using two or more colors you can easily customize it to match your preferences not a fan of weaving in countless ends no problem simply opt for a solid color or add subtle pops of another shade here and there the possibilities are endless and the stitches truly come to life with the color changes for those who appreciate a touch of whimsy the wavy edges add a playful element to the design however if you prefer a more polished look you have the option to straighten the edges to suit your taste to make your crochet journey even smoother i ve created a video tutorial that caters to both right and left-handed crocheters this step-by-step guide will take you through the first three row making it a breeze to create a washcloth size join the community of passionate crocheters who have fallen in love with the cosy ripples crochet blanket pattern discover the joy of creating a timeless heirloom-quality piece that will fill your home with warmth and style order your pattern today and let your crochet hooks dance to the rhythm of creativity skill level confident beginner ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size this pattern is written for 8 sizes preemie 16 wide by 22 long baby 22 wide by 30 long lapghan 36 wide by 48 long throw small - 54 wide by 66 long throw large - 60 wide by 72 long twin / single 66 wide by 90 long queen / double - 90 wide by 108 long king - 108 wide by 108 long ❤ materials i used paintbox simply aran for the green and cream version and women s institute aran yarn from hobbycraft for the gold and cream version 5mm hook stitch markers to mark first and last stitch optional scissors tapestry needle
